Codop[4] A[32] B[32] Shift[5] CarryIn[1] S[32] Flags[4] 
# Codop   A                                      B                                  Shift  CarryIn   RÃ©sultat attendu (S)              Flags attendus (NZCV)
0000      00000000000000000000000000000001     00000000000000000000000000000010     00000   0        00000000000000000000000000000000  0100  # AND
0001      11111111111111111111111111111111     00000000000000000000000000000001     00000   0        11111111111111111111111111111110  1010  # EOR
0010      00000000000000000000000000000001     00000000000000000000000000000010     00001   0        00000000000000000000000000000100  0000  # LSL
0011      11111111111111111111111111111111     00000000000000000000000000000001     00001   0        00000000000000000000000000000000  0110  # LSR
0100      11111111111111111111111111111111     10000000000000000000000000000000     00001   0        11000000000000000000000000000000  1010  # ASR
0101      00000000000000000000000000000001     00000000000000000000000000000001     00000   1        00000000000000000000000000000011  0000  # ADC
0110      00000000000000000000000000000001     00000000000000000000000000000010     00000   1        00000000000000000000000000000001  0000  # SBC
0111      10000000000000000000000000000000     00000000000000000000000000000000     00001   0        00000000000000000000000000000000  0100  # ROR
1000      11111111111111111111111111111111     00000000000000000000000000000001     00000   0        00000000000000000000000000000001  0010  # TST
1010      00000000000000000000000000000101     00000000000000000000000000000011     00000   0        11111111111111111111111111111110  1000  # CMP
1101      00000000000000000000000000000010     00000000000000000000000000000011     00000   0        00000000000000000000000000000110  0000  # MUL
1111      11111111111111111111111111111111     00000000000000000000000000000000     00000   0        00000000000000000000000000000000  0100  # MVN
